subSubSection.paragraph:
24 .
Petaloproctus borealis
Arwidsson, 1907
: 118
–122, pl. 3 , figs. 85–90 , pl. 8, 268–272 . Type : NSMT K 97 – 11–125 ( 1 ). Type locality: North Sea.

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Petaloproctus tenuis
var. borealis
Arwidsson, 1907
: 118
–122, pl. 3 , figs. 85–90 , pl. 8, 268–272 .

Petaloproctus borealis :
Hartman 1948
: 42
;
Uschakov 1955
: 339
, figs. 125 h;
Hartmann-Schröder 1971
: 413
– 412 , figs. 151 a–d;
Hobson and Banse 1981
: 76
, fig. 17 f;
Imajima and Shiraki 1982
: 44
–46, figs. 19 a–k;
Buzhinskaja 1985
: 163
;
Imajima 2001
: 86
.

subSubSection.paragraph: Geographic distribution: North Sea, Japan (Suruga Bay to Korea Strait), Okhotsk Sea, Pacific coast of North America .

Remarks:
Imajima and Shiraki ( 1982 )
elevated the taxonomic status of the variety
Petaloproctus tenuis
var. borealis
Arwidsson, 1907
to the specific rank
Petaloproctus borealis
, emphasizing that the variety is clearly distinguishable, by having 20 setigerous segments and an anal plate with a crenulated margin, while
P. tenuis
has 21 setigerous segments and an anal plate with a smooth margin.

26 .
Petaloproctus dentatus
Imajima and Shiraki, 1982
: 42
–44, figs. 18 a–n. Holotype : NSMT –Pol. H 159 . Paratypes : NSMT –Pol. 160 , NSMT K 97 – 11-250 ( 19 ), NSMT K 97 - 11–300 ( 2 ), NSMT K 98 – 1–250 ( 3 ). Type locality: Japan .
Geographic distribution: Known only from the type locality.

27 .
Petaloproctus macrodentatus
Lee and Paik, 1986
: 23
, fig. 7 a–g. Holotype : 1009 KORDI . Type locality: Yellow Sea, Korea .
Geographic distribution: Known only from the type locality.

28 .
Petaloproctus neoborealis
Hartman, 1969
: 471
, figs. 1–3 . Holotype : not mentioned in description. Type locality: Off San Diego, California, USA , ( 32 ° 3112 N; 11808 30 W).
Geographic distribution: Known only from the type locality.

29 .
Petaloproctus ornatus
Hartman, 1969
: 473
, figs. 1–4 . Holotype not mentioned in description. Type locality: Palos Verdes Point, California, USA , ( 334800 N; 11832 0 0 W ).
Geographic distribution: Known only from the type locality.

30 .
Petaloproctus socialis
Andrews, 1891
: 295
–296, pl. 7 , figs. 36–41 . Type : EL–ECOSUR 2782 . Type locality: North Carolina.

subSubSection.paragraph: Geographic distribution: Northwestern Caribbean to North Carolina and South America , Brazil .
